name: post-robot

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run flow-typed && npm run flow && npm run karma
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run babel && npm run webpack -- $@
scripts.reinstall: rimraf flow-typed && rimraf node_modules && npm install && flow-typed install
